rationale: Users who navigate with keyboards (including accessibility users) cannot see which element is currently focused, making the application inaccessible for keyboard-only navigation. This is a WCAG 2.1 Level AA requirement.
problemSolved: ViewTab buttons in Header.tsx (line 135-154) and QuickFilterChip buttons in FilterPanel.tsx (line 368-385) have hover states but no focus-visible styling. ThemeToggle only has hover:bg-gray-200 without a focus ring.
